pages.text: $(li)The Large Pumpkin Slice is a fruit multiblock.$(br)$(li)You can place four of these blocks to form a Large Pumpkin.

pages.title: Carved L. Pumpkin Slice
pages.text: $(li)You can create Large Carved Pumpkin Slices right clicking while you are holding a Shears on your hand and your are pointing to a Large Pumpkin Slice.
